heading: Foreign language films.
general-note: Here are entered works on motion pictures in a foreign language produced for the export market. Works on motion pictures produced by foreign film companies are entered under the heading. Foreign films.. Instructional films about a language or languages designed for speakers of other languages are entered under the language being taught with subdivisions. Films for foreign speakers. or. Films for French [Spanish, etc.] speakers,. e.g.. English language--Films for foreign speakers; French language--Films for English speakers..
This heading is not used for individual films, which are entered under headings appropriate to the content, genre, and/or form of the film..
